full_text: Suffering from a bad back, he spends seven-hour shifts seated at a sewing machine on a stool below knee height. To see a lawyer, he must skip a meal https://t.co/6rJFs353GT

localize.full_text: 腰を痛め、膝下の高さのスツールに座り、ミシンに向かって7時間交代で働く。弁護士に会うには、食事を抜かなければならない https://t.co/6rJFs353GT
